tool_name: Bible Verses API, Bible Advise, Sermons
tool_description: This API gives access to specific bible verses, advise on life-situations based on bible verses, anything about the bible. You just have to put a string in description of what it is you want about/from the bible
title: Bible Verses API, Bible Advise, Sermons

api_list.name: /bible_advise/question
api_list.description: This API gives access to specific bible verses, advise on life-situations based on bible verses, anything about the bible. You just have to put a string in description of what it is you want about/from the bible
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-verses-api-bible-advise-sermons.p.rapidapi.com/bible_advise/{question}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-verses-api-bible-advise-sermons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
